short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intelligent Assist for VMware vDefend enables a GenAI interactive chatbot interface on the VMware vDefend platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Intelligent Assist simplifies and accelerates threat investigation and remediation on the VMware vDefend platform. The platform provides unparalleled zero-trust lateral security for data center workloads and gives organizations visibility into and protection from ransomware and other cyber threats. This extension enables the Intelligent Assist feature on the vDefend platform and provides the following: 

‚úÖ Provides a secure channel: authenticates, establishes trust and secures communication between the UI and backend services
‚úÖ Seamless multi-user onboarding, activation and management
‚úÖ Interactive chatbot UI that provides users with detailed explanations for threat detections including IDS/IPS, NTA and Malware events
‚úÖ Automated emergency policy recommendations for detection events and NDR campaigns

üìñ For usage and more details visit VMware vDefend documentation: https://techdocs.broadcom.com/us/en/vmware-security-load-balancing/vdefend/vdefend-atp/4-2/iavdefend.html
